name: Super Armand Valentines Edition
description:
Super Armand is about a French mime who has to find his way back to his girlfriend! Help Super Armand overcome junk food enemies to find his girlfriend.

Where will he find his girlfriend?

Super Armand is inspired by classics like Super Mario!

The art style is intentionally stylised for a unique feel.

Want to help me develop my next game? Head over to Patreon to find out how you can help to shape this game and others.

patreon.com/gamesbygeran
